name: Bruxa (xinela)
description:
Curse your enemies, kick out other witches and grab all the mushrooms!

BRUXA is a local multiplayer party game where the objective is to be the witch who  gathers the most mushrooms. The only problem is... only one witch exists at a time. 

Join our community on discord!

Choose between 6 diferent witches

Keyboard and Gamepad supported

3 unique levels

Kosha - 3D Art / GameDesign
Bera - Digital Illustrations
Nana - Letterings  / Digital Illustrations
Átilla “Ats” Gallio - Programming / GameDesign
Mut - Programming / GameDesign
André - Programming / Team Manager
Guilherme Maiolino -  Sound Design / Sound FX
Pedro Neder -  Composition  / Sound Track / Musical Production
